div.p: The Americas Retail Fulfillment Operations Team (RFO) is looking for a Digital Fulfillment Escalations Analyst to drive the Apple Online Store (AOS) fulfillment performance to ensure a world class customer experience. The ideal candidate must be passionate about Apple’s products and customers and able to utilize his or her analytic skills to deliver creative, value-added solutions to the Operations organization at Apple.

ul.li: Experience/expertise in Apple Online Store Service/Escalations/Support preferred
Understanding of Apple’s order fulfillment process
Understanding of AOS policies, programs and procedures
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Organizational skills and ability to multi-task
Excellent data analysis and presentation skills
Detail oriented and self-motivated individual able to function effectively when working independently or in a team
Ability to operate in a fast paced, rapidly changing environment
Ability to maintain poise and a positive attitude in a challenging environment

div.p: - Act as an escalation point for Operations related Executive Escalations working with Ops partners to provide root cause and corrective actions - Investigate and resolve post ship fulfillment issues in partnership with Logistics - Review Customer Satisfaction surveys for trends and customer experience impacts, and work cross functionality to provide solutions and improve the customer experience - Participate in project planning and testing for fulfillment related projects - Work cross-functionally across Operations, AOS, and the regions to determine best practices and provide an amazing customer experience - Participate in execution activities including new product introductions
